properties.name: iisgateway.query.enable
properties.description: Indicates if query will be enabled. When enabled queries can be passed through AART.

properties.name: iisgateway.method
properties.description: What time of end point method should be used: post | soap

properties.name: iisgateway.url
properties.description: The URL where the IIS HL7 end point is at.

properties.name: iisgateway.enable
properties.description: Indicate true/false if sending to IIS is enabled.

properties.name: iisgateway.filterErrors.enable
properties.description: Indicate true/false if VXU messages should not be sent to IIS if they have errors. True indicates that only good messages will be sent onto the IIS. False indicates that all messages will be transmitted to IIS end point.

properties.name: iisgateway.returnAck.mqe.enable
properties.description: Indicate true/false if the ACK created by MQE should be returned. If the IIS ACK is also enabled then MQE will build an ACK that includes the issues raised by the IIS.

properties.name: iisgateway.returnAck.iis.enable
properties.description: Indicate true/false if the ACK returned by the IIS should be returned. If the MQE ACK is also enabled then MQE will build a basic MQE ACK and then include additional ERR segments returned by the IIS.

properties.name: iisgateway.persistData.enable
properties.description: Indicate true/false if the MQE should store the data that is being sent in. False will mean that it can still be forwarded on but nothing will be persisted.

properties.name: tomcat.ajp.port
properties.description: The port number that AJP adapter should start on.

properties.name: tomcat.ajp.enabled
properties.description: True will enable the AJP adapter.
